item.title: New Apple Goodies
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Looks like Apple has been busy releasing new goodies while I was out of town. The new AirPort Express looks pretty cool. At only $129 it looks pretty tempting, now they need someway for this to work the iPod. The other new Apple hardware out is a new Power Mac G5, not quite the speed […]
item.content:encoded:
Looks like Apple has been busy releasing new goodies while I was out of town. The new AirPort Express looks pretty cool. At only $129 it looks pretty tempting, now they need someway for this to work the iPod. The other new Apple hardware out is a new Power Mac G5, not quite the speed bump to 3.0GHz folks were hoping for, but dual 2.5GHz CPUs with a 1.25GHz frontside bus and 8x Superdrive is still pretty impressive. I wonder how long until some dissects the liquid cooling feature.

To go along with the AirPort Express is a new release of iTunes, 4.6, which allows you to stream music to the AirPort Express.
